segments.text: Hey Mark . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . Just watching the sports highlight on ESPN .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I take it you're pretty bored too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just killing time until I find something to do . What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's Saturday and we are sitting at home doing nothing . What's wrong with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I already tried to call up some of the guys , but they are all busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where's your girlfriend ? I thought you were going out with her today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's out shopping with her friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to Starbucks and think of something to do then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aright . Do you have any cigarettes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I only have a couple left . Why don't you pick some up on the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . See you there in about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
